SELECT
CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, d.dept_no, p.prof_no, p.prof_name, CREDIT FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D on (D.DEPT_NO=c.dept_no) left outer JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) left JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON( p.prof_no= CP.PROFESSOR_NO) where TO_NUMBER(D.DEPT_NO) =#{dNo}

SELECT P.PROF_NO,CLASS_NO,CLASS_NAME,P.PROF_NAME,P.DEPT_NO,D.DEPT_NAME,CREDIT,C.CLASS_TYPE,std_no,std_semester
FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D USING(DEPT_NO) JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) join TESTt T using(class_no) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) where std_no =#{sNo} and std_semester =#{semester}
